00037 typedef struct c_rule
00038 {
00043         unsigned short  father;
00048         Order_rule              context;
00054         bool operator< (const c_rule &other) const
00055         {
00056                 return (context < other.context) ||
00057                        (context == other.context && father < other.father);
00058         }
00064         c_rule &operator= (const c_rule &other)
00065         {
00066                 if(this != &other)
00067                 {
00068                         father = other.father;
00069                         context = other.context;
00070                 }
00071                 return *this;
00072         }
00073 } Context_rule;

00152 typedef struct k_plan
00153 {
00158         unsigned short  id_plan;
00163         unsigned short  plan;
00169         bool operator< (const k_plan &other) const
00170         {
00171                 return (id_plan < other.id_plan) ||
00172                        (id_plan == other.id_plan && plan < other.plan);
00173         }
00179         bool operator== (const k_plan &other) const
00180         {
00181                 return (id_plan == other.id_plan) && (plan == other.plan);

00200 typedef struct k_p_project
00201 {
00206         Key_plan                id_plan_project;
00211         const Symbol    *symbol_project;
00216         unsigned short  index_ocurrence;
00222         bool operator< (const k_p_project &other) const
00223         {
00224                 return (id_plan_project < other.id_plan_project) ||
00225                        (id_plan_project == other.id_plan_project && symbol_project->get_name() < other.symbol_project->get_name()) ||
00226                        (id_plan_project == other.id_plan_project && symbol_project->get_name() == other.symbol_project->get_name() && index_ocurrence < other.index_ocurrence);
00227         }
00233         bool operator== (const k_p_project &other) const
00234         {
00235                 return (id_plan_project == other.id_plan_project) && (symbol_project->get_name() == other.symbol_project->get_name()) && (index_ocurrence == other.index_ocurrence);
00236         }
00242         k_p_project &operator= (const k_p_project &other)
